\only<3->{
\addplot[solid,line width=2.0pt,draw=red,fill=white]
%,postaction={draw,decorate,thin,decoration={border,angle=-90, amplitude=2mm,segment length=3mm}}
table[row sep=crcr]{
x y\\
1 0 \\
}node[pos=0,inner sep=0pt](Mitte){};
\draw[red,line width=2pt] (Mitte.center) circle(100);
\addlegendentry{\scriptsize Euler, implizit};
}

}node[pos=0,inner sep=0pt](Mitte2){};

\only<2->{
\node(kreuz1)[circle,draw=black, fill=black, inner sep=1.5pt] at (axis cs: -2.1,0){};
\node(kreuz2)[circle,draw=black, fill=black, inner sep=1.5pt] at (axis cs: -0.5,0){};
\node(beschr1) at (axis cs: -3,1.5){$T=2.1$};
\node(beschr2) at (axis cs: 1,1.8){$T=0.5$};

}
